    • Uses of Player in GameModel

      Methods in GameModel that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<Player> World.getAllPlayers()
      Generates an iterator of all the players in the world.
      java.util.Iterator<Player> Area.getAllPlayersExcept(Character ch1)
      Get all of the Players inside of the room except the passed in Character.
      java.util.Iterator<Player> Area.getAllPlayersExcept(Character ch1, Character ch2)
      Get all of the Players inside of the room except the passed in Characters.
      java.util.Iterator<Player> Area.getPlayers()
      Get all of the Players that are inside of the Area.
      java.util.Iterator<Player> Notification.getPlayersToNotify()
      Returns the iterator of Players that will be sent the Note
      Methods in GameModel with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void World.sendPlayer(Player p)
      Sends the player to the clients.
      void Area.setSunny(boolean sunny, World w, Player p)
      The method will change the room to be a Sunny Room.
      boolean World.takeItem(Player p, java.lang.String itemName)
      Makes player p take the given item from the room they are located in.
      void SunWand.use(Player p) 
      void SmallHealthPot.use(Player p) 
      void MediumHealthPot.use(Player p) 
      void LargeHealthPot.use(Player p) 
      abstract void Consumable.use(Player p)
      Calls the consumable's use method to effect the player.
      void Bomb.use(Player p, World w)
      If the room defined by p is bombable, it will do the appropriate bomb effects.
      Constructors in GameModel with parameters of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      Notification(Player player, boolean b)
      A minimal constructor that takes a single Player parameter to send the Note to and a boolean that determines whether or not the Note is a chat message.
      Notification(Player playerToRecieve, java.lang.String message, boolean isChat)
      This constructor takes a single Player as a parameter rather than an iterator holding multiple Players.
      Constructor parameters in GameModel with type arguments of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN)
      The default constructor for Notification takes a Player Iterator parameter and sets it to the toBeNotified field.
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN, java.lang.String note)
      A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN, java.lang.String note, boolean isChat)
      A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message and a boolean as to whether the note is a chat message or not.
